attributes.background: The majority of the registered fox hunting packs in the UK are breaking the law and continue to hunt foxes , they are coursing foxes with packs of hounds who have not been retrained onto artificial scent. coursing  with dogs is illegal and extremely cruel and it needs to stop

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want Parliament to strengthen the Hunting Act 2004 you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/205852
